getFormQuery.query: query amendedForm($recordID: String!) {  amendedForm(recordID: $recordID) {    ... on ErrorMessage {      message    }    ... on Form {      record {        ...record      }      hasOpenChangeRequest      changeRequest {        requestNote        formChangeRequestID        status            }      openChangeRequest {        requestNote        recordID        formChangeRequestID        status        respondedBy        requestedByUserID        requestedBy        createdAt        entities {            formEntityUniqueId            formChangeRequestEntityID            entityNote            conditional            value            fieldName            responseValue        }       }      attachments {        ...attachment      }      sections {        __typename        ... on SingleEntrySection {          ...section          fields {            ...field          }        }        ... on MultiEntrySection {          ...section          fieldGroups {            rowId            fields {              ...field            }          }        }      }    }  }}fragment attachment on Attachment {  formEntityUniqueId  recordAttachmentId  type  attachmentID  label  description  order  isRequired  isVisible  lastUpdatedDate  lastUpdatedByUserID  uploadedFile {    entryId    fileName    sharedUrl    thumbnailUrl    fileDate    uploadedByUserID    uploadedBy  }  changeRequest {    formChangeRequestEntityID    formEntityUniqueId    entityNote    formChangeRequestID    conditional    value    responseValue    status  }}fragment record on Record {  recordID  recordNo  recordTypeID  status  renews  renewalOfRecordID  renewalNo  renewalSubmitted}fragment section on FormSection {  __typename  id  type  label  order  isRequired  isVisible  helpText  lastUpdatedByUserID  showIf}fragment fieldEntry on FormFieldEntry {  entryId  lastUpdatedByUserID  value  dataTypeOptions {    __typename    ... on AttachmentFieldEntry {      fileName      fileDate      sharedUrl      thumbnailUrl      uploadedByUserID      uploadedBy    }    ... on ESignatureFieldEntry {      eSignatureEntryID      eSignature      signatureDate    }    ... on BooleanFieldEntry {      booleanValue: value    }    ... on DateFieldEntry {      dateValue: value    }    ... on EncryptedFieldEntry {      encryptedValue: value    }    ... on NumberFieldEntry {      numberValue: value    }    ... on StringFieldEntry {      stringValue: value    }  }}fragment field on FormFieldType {  id: formEntityUniqueId  fieldId: id    key  label  isRequired  isVisible  isPublicViewable  helpText  type  formEntityUniqueId  helpText  key  showIf  changeRequest {    formChangeRequestEntityID    entityNote    formChangeRequestID    conditional    value    responseValue    status  }  __typename  ... on AttachmentFormField {    entry {      ...fieldEntry    }  }  ... on ESignatureFormField {    entry {      ...fieldEntry    }  }  ... on DropDownFormField {    dataTypeOptions {      dropdownItems {        id        name      }    }    entry {      ...fieldEntry    }  }  ... on BaseFormField {    customMinMax    hasMaxCapacity    min    max    calculation    calculationFields    entry {      ...fieldEntry    }  }}

saveChangeRequestQuery.query: mutation saveChangeRequest ($input: ChangeRequestInput!) {  saveChangeRequest (input: $input) {    ... on ErrorMessage {      message   }    ... on ChangeRequestUpdatedResponse {      formChangeRequestID    }  }}

submitChangeResponseQuery.query: mutation applicantResponse ($input: ChangeRequestResponseInput!) {  applicantResponse (input: $input) {  ... on ErrorMessage {  message   }  ... on ChangeRequestResponseUpdatedResponse {  success  errors  validationErrors { formEntityUniqueId  fieldName  errors } totalUpdates } } }
